org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

类 ReversedClientScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.AbstractClientScanner
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ClientScanner
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ReversedClientScanner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Result>, ResultScanner

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ReversedClientScanner
extends ClientScanner
    A reversed client scanner which support backward scanning

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ClientScanner

        cache, caching, callable, caller, closed, conf, currentRegion, lastNext, lastResult, maxScannerResultSize, pool, primaryOperationTimeout, rpcControllerFactory, scan, scanMetricsPublished, scannerTimeout, tableName

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.AbstractClientScanner

        scanMetrics

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversedClientScanner(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, Scan scan, TableName tableName, ClusterConnection connection, RpcRetryingCallerFactory rpcFactory, RpcControllerFactory controllerFactory, ExecutorService pool, int primaryOperationTimeout)
      Create a new ReversibleClientScanner for the specified table Note that the passed Scan's start row maybe changed.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Will be called in moveToNextRegion to create ScannerCallable.

      Will be called in moveToNextRegion when currentRegion is null.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReversedClientScanner

        public ReversedClientScanner(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                             Scan scan,
                             TableName tableName,
                             ClusterConnection connection,
                             RpcRetryingCallerFactory rpcFactory,
                             RpcControllerFactory controllerFactory,
                             ExecutorService pool,
                             int primaryOperationTimeout)
                      throws IOException
        Create a new ReversibleClientScanner for the specified table Note that the passed Scan's start row maybe changed.
        参数:
        conf -
        scan -
        tableName -
        connection -
        pool -
        primaryOperationTimeout -
        抛出:
        IOException

    • 方法详细资料

      • setNewStartKey

        protected boolean setNewStartKey()
        从类复制的说明: ClientScanner
        Will be called in moveToNextRegion when currentRegion is null. Abstract because for normal scan, we will start next scan from the endKey of the currentRegion, and for reversed scan, we will start next scan from the startKey of the currentRegion.
        指定者:
        setNewStartKey 在类中 ClientScanner
        返回:
        false if we have reached the stop row. Otherwise true.

      • createScannerCallable

        protected ReversedScannerCallable createScannerCallable()
        从类复制的说明: ClientScanner
        Will be called in moveToNextRegion to create ScannerCallable. Abstract because for reversed scan we need to create a ReversedScannerCallable.
        指定者:
        createScannerCallable 在类中 ClientScanner
